ygData.subject: Re: 3rd Rank spells ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Halo of Light is a great spell, it can be worn and gives a better AC bonus than your cloth helm now and is also one of the best light sources available.
ygData.messageBody:
Halo of Light is a great spell, it can be worn and gives a better AC bonus
than your cloth helm now and is also one of the best light sources
available. Resistant Skin is nice because it adds 10 to your Poison and
Disease resist. This is helpful when hunting spiders and mummies but it is
self cast only. Rain of Fire sucks, hits for 28 a maximum of 3 times but I
rarely, and I do mean rarely, ever see this happen.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Larimus La'shain [mailto:larimus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 1:02 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] 3rd Rank spells ?

From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>

I have attained the 4th rank of spells and would like some
advice on
which spells to get next. I buy new spells as a get the
money ( My
Runed Totem staff cleaned me out) Now I have Shock of
lightning, Bind
Affinity, and just purchased spiral of frost. I am intrigued
by halo
of light and resistant skin. Any advice one the order of
spells I
should purchase and reasoning why would be appreciated.

TIA
Larimus La'Shain
